Review Name: Excellent Review Description: Good product but the delivery is poor i get my indoor unit first and after a long inquary i came to know that my outdoor unit is left behind in hub and after five days they deliver me the out door unit.overall the ac is good but there are some pros and cons too.. Pros 90% 1.cooling is verry good for my room 230sqfoot in 15 to 20 min. 2.less electriciety consumpsion on 26 degree. 3.4 in 1 coolling ie, convertable to lesser ton capieciety according to needs. 4.low noise level indoor and outdoor. 5.bilt qualiety best in class. 6.warrenty 1year on product condencer coil. 5 years on circuit. 10 years on compressor which is good. 7.energy efficiency. Conditions apply.. Cons. 10% 1.no night glow buttons on remort. 2.air flow flif not opens on 90 degree Overall the product is good enough for use...
